duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide world-class customer service and exceed customer expectations in the pharmacy.
Oversee the operation of the pharmacy, ensuring compliance with company standards and regulations.
Administer immunizations and provide clinical services according to relevant case load.
Dispense or compound medications to customers pursuant to prescriptions, following laws, regulations, policies, procedures, and ethics standards.
Evaluate new and existing medications within patient profiles to ensure no drug interactions prior to filling prescriptions.
Maintain records and reports related to pharmacy functions, volume, and sales.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Pharmacy or PharmD. Previous experience preferred.
